products.name: Gaming Laptop
products.description: High performance laptop with RTX 3060 GPU, 16GB RAM, suitable for programming and gaming.

products.name: Android Smartphone
products.description: 64MP camera, 5000mAh battery, 120Hz display for smooth gaming and streaming.

products.name: Wireless Headphones
products.description: Bluetooth 5.0, 30hr battery, active noise cancellation, IPX4 water resistant.

products.name: Tablet Pro
products.description: 12.4-inch display, stylus support, 256GB storage for productivity and entertainment.

products.name: Premium Cashews
products.description: 500g pack of roasted cashews with sea salt, sourced from Kerala farms.

products.name: Organic Honey
products.description: Pure Himalayan multifloral honey, 500g jar, raw and unprocessed.

products.name: Dark Chocolate
products.description: 70% cocoa dark chocolate bar, 100g, no added sugar, vegan friendly.

products.name: Hydrating Face Cream
products.description: 50ml anti-aging cream with hyaluronic acid and vitamin C for daily use.

products.name: Lipstick Matte
products.description: Long-lasting matte lipstick, 4.2g, 12-hour wear, available in 10 shades.

products.name: Sunscreen SPF 50
products.description: Broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection, non-greasy, 50ml pump bottle.

products.name: Kajal Waterproof
products.description: Smudge-proof kajal pencil, 1g, 12-hour stay, easy glide formula.

products.name: Aviator Sunglasses
products.description: Polarized UV400 lenses, metal frame, suitable for men and women.

products.name: Reading Glasses
products.description: +1.5 to +3.0 power options, anti-scratch lenses, lightweight TR90 frame.

products.name: Blue Light Glasses
products.description: Anti-glare computer glasses, 100% blue light blocking, clear vision.

products.name: Fitness Smart Watch
products.description: Heart rate, SpO2, 100+ sports modes, 7-day battery, 1.69-inch display.

products.name: Analog Wrist Watch
products.description: Stainless steel case, sapphire crystal, water resistant 50m, leather strap.

products.name: Sports Chronograph
products.description: Chronograph function, tachymeter bezel, rubber strap, 100m water resistance.
